data.title: Mitchell Williams - Commercial Litigation Lawyers
meta_keywords: how long do business litigations take
data.meta_description: Mitchell Williams Law Firm's commercial litigation lawyers have the expertise required to serve business/commercial clients in disputes. Learn more.
data.text:
Strategic approach and real-world solutions to help clients effectively resolve disputes and get back to business.

Business disputes can surface in any commercial context and industry and threaten a business' reputation, economic interests and corporate relationships. At Mitchell Williams, our experienced litigation team has the extensive legal knowledge required to protect and defend business and commercial clients in disputes with other businesses, government entities or groups of individuals.

We represent companies across diverse industry sectors and work to advance each client’s interests, understanding that a client’s business plan, balance sheet and competitive profile are critical elements for successfully positioning litigation matters. We work to provide progressive solutions to help our clients solve their toughest problems and approach each new challenge as an urgent business matter to be resolved expeditiously and cost-effectively.

Our integrated team includes nationally recognized litigators who are members of the International Association of Defense Counsel, Professional Liability Defense Federation, America College of Trial Lawyers, Federation of Defense and Corporate Counsel and the American Academy of Trial Counsel. Our team has obtained highly successful results, working with national and local companies on matters in local, state and federal courts at both the trial and appellate levels.

HIGHLIGHTS

Aggressive advocates skilled in developing practical solutions to real-world business problems

Vast experience managing complex, high-stakes litigation

Extensive courtroom experience to try cases to verdict and handle all appeals

Integrated team to leverage in-depth knowledge and experience across the firm

CAPABILITIES
